title: Google DeepMind co-founder hints AI as smart as humans is almost here, says it will change economy
description: Experts are now beginning to say that AI will soon reach the Artificial General Intelligence level, in other words at an intelligence that is as good as that of humans. Latest in line to echo this view is Google DeepMind co-founder who is also hiring an economist that can study impact of AGI on the world.
content: AI is getting smarter and smarter. However, there is one thing that still sets it apart from humans: consciousness and general reasoning. Or the lack of it. But what if AI develops such ability? Once it does so it will not longer be mere AI but will ... [2934 chars]

title: NextGen AI Growth for PropTech & Real Estate trained channel partners in AI
description: Hyderabad (Telangana) [India], January 23: In a milestone moment for India's real estate enablement ecosystem,'NextGen AI Growth for PropTech & Real Estate'--a first-of-its-kind, execution-focused training program designed to help real estate professionals apply Artificial Intelligence directly to lead generation, buyer trust-building, site visit conversion, and predictable revenue systems hosted at T-Hub. The event, sponsored by Sree Siddi Vinayaka Property Developers, brought together 250 independent channel partners, Real estate Enthusiasts, Realestate Founders for an immersive, hands-on learning experience aimed at modernizing the way real estate is marketed and sold in an increasingly digital-first marketplace.
